title: Define VisualizationHub subscriptions
description: Add subscribe/unsubscribe messages to nbn_viz.proto and update Visualizer/clients to use them for event streaming. Current VizHub only supports PID-based subscribe without standardized proto.

title: Update Workbench Visualizer for VizSubscribe
description: Update Nbn.Tools.Workbench visualizer client to send nbn.viz.VizSubscribe/VizUnsubscribe messages (new proto fields) instead of PID-only local messages.
